fieldDefinitions.phase: Which Bloom phase this work belongs to.
fieldDefinitions.motifMap: Symbolic elements appearing in the work.

title: The Psalm of 14 More Days
summary: A psalm voiced from the middle stretch of waiting—caught between doubt and trust, shadow and light, moving forward one day at a time under God’s guidance.

motifMap.meaning: The coexistence of clarity and confusion.
The ongoing pilgrimage without clear destination.
Holding extremes in a single small vessel—the self as container.

associatedMedia.description: Substack header image if present; otherwise text-only psalm.
